channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Strange ripples frozen in Mars’ sands could hold keys to human survival
item.description: Perseverance is exploring Mars’ sandy ripples, strange frozen waves that could reveal how wind still shapes the planet. Along the way it uncovered unu...

item.title: Scientists unlock nature’s secret to superfast mini robots
item.description: Ripple bugs’ fan-like legs inspired engineers to build the Rhagobot, a tiny robot with self-morphing fans. By mimicking these insects’ passive, ultra-...

item.title: Stopping time in cells exposes life’s fastest secrets
item.description: Scientists have developed a groundbreaking cryo-optical microscopy technique that freezes living cells mid-action, capturing ultra-detailed snapshots ...

item.title: Extinct human relatives left a genetic gift that helped people thrive in the Americas

item.title: Jupiter’s core isn’t what we thought
